description: Lead Architect is sole resource capable of complex Recursive Sync logic and ClickHouse Schema.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory architectural review session with Backend Dev before implementation.
contingency_plan: Backend Dev pairs with Lead Arch during Sprint 2.

description: Backend Engineer utilization >100% in Sprint 4 due to heavy Cart Recovery logic.
mitigation_strategy: Reallocate TASK-CART-003 (Template Engine) to Frontend Engineer.
contingency_plan: Push non-critical email features to post-MVP.
monitoring_trigger: Backend Dev backlog hours > 35 in Sprint 4 planning.
